# The `SymbolConverter` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Specialized <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/macho/recordvisitor">RecordVisitor</a> for collecting exported symbols and undefined symbols if RecordSlice being visited represents a flat-namespaced library. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Specialized <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/macho/recordvisitor">RecordVisitor</a> for collecting exported symbols and undefined symbols if RecordSlice being visited represents a flat-namespaced library.

Definition at line 35 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/textapi/recordvisitor-h">RecordVisitor.h</a>.
